document.full_text: members of the people's mujahedeen organization of iran, a blacklisted iranian dissident group, said 34 people were killed and 318 wounded in a raid last week.
document.title: iranian group seeks u.s. shield after iraqi raid
lines_and_colors: members of the people's mujahedeen organization of iran, a blacklisted iranian dissident group, said 34 people were killed and 318 wounded in a raid last week.
